是故駢於足者，¶	KR2c0021_112:89b:3:7:2,KR3k0045_115:23b:3:4:5,KR5c0051_004:1b:7:1:0,KR5c0126_008:1a:10:1:1,KR5c0127_022:001a:6:12:2,KR5c0128_011:001a:6:12:2,KR5c0135_009:001b:8:1:3,KR5c0138_004:1b:6:17:1,KR5c0139_010:002b:10:1:3,KR5h0057_003:001a:6:12:1,KR5i0036_003:03p001b:1:40:3
連无用之肉也；¶	KR5c0126_008:1a:11:1:1

樹无用之指也；¶	KR5c0126_008:1a:13:1:1

是故駢於明者，¶	KR2c0021_112:89b:5:13:2,KR3k0045_115:23b:5:10:5,KR5c0051_004:2b:8:1:0,KR5c0126_008:2a:1:1:2,KR5c0127_022:006a:1:1:47,KR5c0128_011:002a:2:1:2,KR5c0135_009:001b:10:17:3,KR5c0138_004:2a:3:27:1,KR5c0139_010:004a:3:1:3,KR5h0057_003:002b:4:1:3,KR5i0036_003:03p001b:4:13:3
亂五色，¶
淫文章，¶
青黃黼黻之煌煌非乎？¶	KR5c0067_003:021a:1:15:37,KR5c0126_008:2a:4:1:2,KR5i0036_003:03p001b:4:25:3
而離朱是已。¶	KR2c0021_112:89b:6:13:2,KR3k0045_115:23b:6:10:5,KR5c0051_004:3a:1:5:0,KR5c0067_003:021a:2:8:37,KR5c0126_008:2a:5:1:2,KR5c0127_022:006a:2:5:47,KR5c0128_011:002a:3:5:2,KR5c0128_011:002b:3:13:2,KR5c0135_009:002a:2:10:3,KR5c0138_004:2a:4:14:1,KR5c0139_010:004a:4:5:3,KR5h0057_003:002b:5:5:3

駢於辯者，¶	KR2c0021_112:90a:1:12:2,KR3k0045_115:24a:1:9:5,KR5c0051_004:3b:4:1:0,KR5c0067_004:021b:1:5:0,KR5c0126_008:2a:14:1:4,KR5c0127_022:006a:5:16:47,KR5c0127_022:008a:9:4:47,KR5c0128_011:002a:6:16:2,KR5c0135_009:002b:1:1:4,KR5c0138_004:2b:2:1:1,KR5c0139_010:005b:9:1:3,KR5h0057_003:002b:8:16:3,KR5i0036_003:03p002a:1:30:3

而敝跬譽无用之言非乎？¶	KR5c0126_008:2a:17:1:4
而楊墨是已。¶	KR2c0021_112:90a:2:20:2,KR3k0045_115:24a:2:17:5,KR5c0067_004:021b:3:2:0,KR5c0126_008:2a:18:1:4,KR5c0127_022:006a:7:11:47,KR5c0128_011:002a:8:11:2,KR5c0135_009:002b:2:13:4,KR5c0138_004:2b:3:9:1,KR5h0057_003:002b:10:11:3

# dating: 8110
故性長非所斷，¶	KR2b0017_073:7a:4:12:1,KR2c0021_112:90a:6:10:2,KR3k0058_126:7b:8:15:2,KR4d0074_039:5b:4:26:15,KR4h0066_009:4a:4:24:8,KR5c0051_004:4a:5:49:0,KR5c0067_004:022a:4:7:0,KR5c0126_008:3a:11:1:6,KR5c0127_022:006b:1:16:47,KR5c0128_011:003b:2:3:2,KR5c0135_009:003a:3:3:4,KR5c0139_010:008b:6:1:3,KR5h0057_003:003a:5:2:3,KR5i0036_003:03p002b:3:22:3,KR6d0063_013:0398b:21:8:203,KR6q0092_023:0542c:4:12:5,KR6s0006_009:0569c:26:17:110,KR6s0070_006:0098a:6:13:26

无所去憂也。¶	KR4h0066_009:4a:4:35:8,KR5c0126_008:3a:13:1:6
意仁義其非人情乎！¶	KR2c0021_112:90a:7:5:2,KR2c0021_112:90b:2:19:2,KR5c0051_004:5a:4:2:1,KR5c0126_008:3a:14:1:6,KR5c0126_008:3a:28:2:8,KR5c0127_023:001a:4:1:2,KR5c0127_023:001a:8:10:2,KR5c0128_011:003b:3:2:2,KR5c0128_011:004a:10:11:2,KR5c0135_009:003a:4:3:4,KR5c0135_009:003a:9:15:4,KR5c0138_004:3a:5:25:1,KR5c0138_004:3b:6:1:1,KR5c0139_010:009a:2:1:3,KR5c0139_010:011a:4:2:3,KR5h0057_003:004a:6:1:4,KR5h0057_003:004a:10:11:4,KR5i0036_003:03p002b:4:29:3,KR5i0036_003:03p002b:10:13:3

二者，¶

且夫待鉤繩規矩而正者，¶	KR2c0021_112:90b:3:19:2,KR3k0056_154:43a:6:5:9,KR5c0051_004:5a:7:1:1,KR5c0126_008:3a:31:1:9,KR5c0127_023:001a:9:14:2,KR5c0128_011:005a:3:1:2,KR5c0135_009:003b:4:1:5,KR5c0138_004:3b:7:31:1,KR5c0139_010:011b:3:1:3,KR5h0057_003:004b:1:15:5,KR5i0036_003:03p003a:1:25:3,KR6q0219_002:0037a:16:1:9
是削其性也；	KR2c0021_112:90b:4:8:2,KR3k0025_003:29a:5:6:20,KR3k0045_115:24a:4:10:5,KR3k0056_154:43a:6:15:9,KR3k0056_167:43a:2:15:9,KR3k0060_025:9a:1:44:2,KR5c0051_004:5a:7:11:1,KR5c0063_002:009b:8:7:7,KR5c0064_004:023a:4:10:9,KR5c0079_006:014a:7:11:5,KR5c0126_008:3a:32:1:9,KR5c0127_023:001a:10:7:2,KR5c0128_011:005a:3:11:2,KR5c0135_009:003b:4:11:5,KR5c0138_004:3b:8:5:1,KR5c0139_010:011b:3:11:3,KR5h0057_003:004b:2:8:5,KR5i0036_003:03p003a:2:2:3

# dating: 8110
天下有常然。¶	KR2b0017_073:7a:5:7:1,KR2c0021_112:90b:6:5:2,KR3k0045_115:24a:6:7:5,KR3k0056_154:46b:3:5:12,KR5c0047_001:003a:5:8:1,KR5c0051_004:5b:2:3:1,KR5c0063_003:025a:7:12:17,KR5c0064_008:002b:8:15:2,KR5c0064_010:006a:3:12:5,KR5c0067_006:015b:2:7:27,KR5c0067_006:015b:5:7:27,KR5c0067_008:004b:2:8:5,KR5c0069_002:012b:10:9:10,KR5c0079_006:014a:10:4:5,KR5c0079_010:027a:4:16:8,KR5c0079_010:027b:6:7:8,KR5c0079_011:025b:5:16:6,KR5c0079_012:021b:2:1:5,KR5c0080_003:021b:8:4:18,KR5c0107_009:003b:1:14:1,KR5c0126_008:3a:37:1:10,KR5c0127_023:001b:2:12:2,KR5c0127_025:002b:1:2:2,KR5c0128_011:005b:2:1:2,KR5c0135_009:003b:6:18:5,KR5c0138_004:4a:2:2:1,KR5c0139_010:012b:2:1:3,KR5h0057_003:004b:4:14:5,KR5i0036_003:03p003a:4:24:3
常然者，¶

則仁義
又奚連連如膠漆纆索，¶	KR2c0021_112:91a:1:19:2,KR5c0126_008:3a:49:4:11,KR5c0127_023:001b:7:3:2,KR5c0127_023:003b:5:12:2,KR5c0128_011:005b:6:10:2,KR5c0135_009:004a:4:4:5,KR5c0138_004:4a:6:17:1,KR5h0057_003:004b:9:8:5,KR5i0036_003:03p003a:9:32:3
而遊乎道德之間為哉，¶	KR3k0045_115:24b:2:9:5,KR5c0126_008:3a:50:1:11

均也，¶
奚必伯夷之是而盜跖之非乎！¶	KR2c0021_112:91b:4:5:2,KR5c0126_008:3a:81:1:14,KR5c0127_023:008b:8:14:28,KR5c0128_011:007b:6:11:2,KR5c0135_009:005a:3:15:6,KR5c0138_004:5a:8:9:1,KR5c0139_010:018b:9:1:3,KR5h0057_003:006b:8:15:7,KR5i0036_003:03p004a:3:20:3

若其殘生損性，¶	KR2c0021_112:91b:6:18:2,KR3k0045_014:2b:7:12:2,KR5c0051_004:8a:3:12:1,KR5c0126_008:3a:90:1:16,KR5c0127_023:009a:2:1:28,KR5c0128_011:007b:9:15:2,KR5c0135_009:005a:7:2:6,KR5c0138_004:5b:4:5:1,KR5c0139_010:019b:1:14:3,KR5h0057_003:007a:2:1:7,KR5i0036_003:03p004a:7:3:3
則盜跖亦伯夷已，¶	KR2c0021_112:91b:7:3:2,KR5c0051_004:8a:4:1:1,KR5c0126_008:3a:91:1:16,KR5c0127_023:009a:2:7:28,KR5c0128_011:007b:10:4:2,KR5c0135_009:005a:7:8:6,KR5c0138_004:5b:4:11:1,KR5c0139_010:019b:2:3:3,KR5h0057_003:007a:2:7:7,KR5i0036_003:03p004a:7:9:3
